articles.title: Bitcoin 'in position' for first key RSI breakout in 6 months at $85K
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) circled $85,000 into the March 23 weekly close as excitement over a key trend change grew. Bitcoin is expected to rise to $100,000 on March 24th. Bitcoin's value rose to $1,715,000 at the end of last week.

articles.title: Bitcoin mining hashprice stays flat despite higher difficulty: Report
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: The Bitcoin mining hashprice has remained constant at around $48 per petahash per second (PH/s) despite a slight 1.4% uptick in Bitcoin difficulty. A miner's daily revenue per unit of hashing power expended to mine blocks is $48.

articles.title: Pakistan Sees Opportunity in Bitcoin Mining with Excess Energy: Bitcoin Revolution in Pakistan?
articles.author: Crypto Ninjas
articles.summary: Bitcoin mining could help Pakistan burn its way with excess power, as it could help someone else with excess electricity in Pakistan. It could be used to power Pakistan's factories.  It could also help people in Pakistan burn their way with electricity.  For more information on Bitcoin mining, visit Bitcoin.com.
